column1: While Y. enterocolitica explores citrate for anaerobic metabolism, it is most likely that the specific uptake of citrate and other tricarboxylic acids by TctCBA is used by P. luminescens upon entering the insect host where enough citrate is available.
Under limiting Mg2 + conditions, the addition of excess Mg2 +, Ca2 + or Mn2 +, but not Zn2 +, repressed PA3553 expression ( Fig 7B).
